category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > 2.4 GHz Transceivers
name: mikroe.click.ccrf
short_description: ccRF click is a low-power 2.4 GHz transceiver designed for the 2400- 2483.5 MHz ISM and SRD frequency bands. It features CC2500 Low-Power 2.4 GHz RF transceiver as well as PCB trace antenna. The CC2500 is integrated with a highly configurable baseband modem that supports various modulation formats and has data rate up to 500 kBaud.
